Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.effect

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CanPositioningEverywhereLeader
    Class to create the Can Position everywhere effect
    CanPositioningEverywhereLeaderTest
    This class tests the CanPositioningEveryWhere effect (Leader Cards), so it enables the Effect on a player and then checks if the player can position its familiar every where
    CardBan
    Class that represent the Card ban effect At the end of the match, delete the corresponding cards in the player list
    CardBanTest
    This class tests the CardBan class, so it create the effect, enable it on a player and later verify that he do not has anymore the cards according to the effect
    CardCostBan
    At the end of the match, the gamelogic calculate the cost of woods and stones of the indicated cards and remove victory points from the player resources
    CardCostBanTest
    This class tests the functionality of the CardCostBan effect, so it creates two player with some victory points and some cards, later activate the CardCostBan on each of the players and checks their victory points
    CardForEachObtain
    Class that represent the Card For Each Obtain effect.
    CardForEachObtainTest
    This class tests the CardForEach effect, so it creates a Player with different cards, enable on him the CardForEach effect and later verifies that the right number of resources has been given to the player
    CouncilObtain
    Create a request for the gamelogic to obtain the resources from the council privileges
    CouncilObtainTest
    This class tests the functionality of the CouncilObtain effect, so it creates two player that will take a card with a CouncilObtain effect, enable it, resolve its requests and later verify the resources of each player
    DoAction
    Allow player to do another action This creates an ActionPrototype, that will be consumed by the GameLogic
    DoActionTest
    This test verifies if the DoAction effect works correctly.
    Effect
    This is the abstract class for all the game effects, such as Immediate, Permanent and Ban effect With this class was implemented the Strategy Pattern
    FiveMoreVictoryPointLeader
    Class that represents the leader effect which give to the user five more victory points every time he pays his faith point
    FiveMoreVictoryPointLeaderTest
    This test is used to verifyif the FiveMoreVictoryPointLeader effect is activated correctly.
    ForEachObtain
    Class that represents the For Each obtain, in other words, when this effect is activated, the player obtain something for each requirements he has among his resources
    ForEachObtainTest
    This JUnit test case verifies if the ForEachObtain effect works.
    IncreaseAction
    Create a particular effect that increments the level of an action.
    IncreaseActionTest
    Class used to verify if the IncreaseAction effect works correctly.
    IncreaseFamiliarsPoint
    Class that represents the increase familiars point effect.
    IncreaseFamiliarsPointTest
    This class is used to test the IncreaseFamiliarsPoint effect.
    IncreaseSingleFamiliar
    Simple method used to increment only one familiar
    IncreaseSingleFamiliarTest
    This class is used to test the IncreaseSingleFamiliar effect
    NoBonusInTower
    This method set a player variable to disable the Tower Bonus
    NoBonusInTowerTest
    This test is used to verifyif the NoBonusInTower effect is activated correctly.
    NoFirstActionBan
    Set a player variable, then the GameLogic knows the player cannot play the first action
    NoFirstActionBanTest
    This test is used to verifyif the NoFirstActionBan effect is activated correctly.
    NoMarketBan  
    NoMarketBanTest
    This test is used to verifyif the NoMarketBan effect is activated correctly.
    NoMilitaryRequirementsLeader  
    NoMilitaryRequirementsLeaderTest
    This test is used to verifyif the NoMilitaryRequirementsLeader effect is activated correctly.
    NoMoneyMalusLeader  
    NoMoneyMalusLeaderTest
    This test is used to verifyif the NoMoneyMalusLeader effect is activated correctly.
    Obtain
    Obtain the indicated resources by paying the following costs
    ObtainBan
    ObtainBan Class.
    ObtainBanTest
    This class is used to test the ObtainBan effect.
    ObtainTest
    This testing unit is used to test the Obtain effect.
    SetAllFamiliarsLeader
    Class that represents the leader effect that set all familiars values, e.g. the "Ludovico il Moro" effect.
    SetAllFamiliarsLeaderTest
    This JUnit aims to verify if the SetAllFamiliarsLeader effect works correctly.
    SetSingleFamiliarLeader
    Effect used in leader cards to set one familiar value
    SetSingleFamiliarLeaderTest
    This test aims to verify if the SetSingleFamiliarLeader effect works well
    SlaveBan
    A player need more slaves to increase his familiars.
    SlaveBanTest
    This Testing Unit aims to test the SlaveBan effect, for this reason it tries to enable that effect and verify if it is correctly activated
